rows.label: qev050405_MSG0001
rows.name:
Move! MOVE! ...Rgh, you damnable pile of junk!
Why do you break down NOW?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0002
rows.name:
The fault lies not in the Skell, De Ezich,
but in your lack of skill.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0004
rows.name:
I do not know who you are or where you come from,
but I thank you for leading our son back from the path
of temptation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0005
rows.name: Please accept this as a token of our appreciation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0006
rows.name:
...Please, you must take it. Refusal—even out of
modesty—would be a great shame to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0007
rows.name:
And you, De Ezich! You have spurned your parents,
besmirched the honor of this duel, and insulted the
Wrothian ways. These are serious crimes indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0009
rows.name:
Y-you're not going to make me slit my belly, are you?!
Please, Mother! Not my life! I need that to live![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0010
rows.name:
...[ST:playername ], please!
Who knows what they'll do to me?!
You have to help me! PLEASE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_SEL0011
rows.name: Entreat De Soghu to be merciful.

rows.label: qev050405_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell De Ezich that a thorough beating will do him good.

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0011
rows.name:
Fear not, human—he is still my beloved son.
I will make it as painless as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0012
rows.name:
Yes. I fear I have been too gentle in the past.
I will not make the mistake of half-measures again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0013
rows.name: I knew it! EEEEEEAAAAGH! I'm going to DIEEEEEEE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0014
rows.name:
Hush, fool! What parent would claim their child's life?!
We shall simply provide discipline. ...Lots of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050405_MSG0015
rows.name:
Now march and be happy. When this is all over,
you'll be a Wrothian for true![ST:wait ]
